name: tariff-ai-monorepo
description: Intelligent HTS & Tariff Management System - Monorepo

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -c "from app.services.db_init import init_database; import asyncio; asyncio.run(init_database())"
